page.title: 02GAZETTEER 2
page.content:
housing attempts to create a'village' atmosphere with neighbourhood shops and amenities.The town centre with the main shopping complex is out of our area.'High Tech'industries such as International Computers Ltd.and British Aerospace are major employers but are again located beyond our survey. The Ministry of Transport Road Research Laboratory is in Crowthorne.
Caesar's Camp is a Celtic earthwork and Easthampstead Park and South Hill Park are historic mansions.The former is now part of a comprehensive school and the latter is a major Arts Centre with theatre and musical facilities. There is a large sports centre with swimming and athletics facilities and a public golf course.
